basics.name: Hugo Ferreira de Almeida
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I've had the opportunity to work until now in very different environments and tasks that allowed me to grow professionally and adapt quickly to change and requirements of what is needed by business. I'm always eager to learn and get things done, I want to work in challenging problems, that have impact in people's life. On the technical side I love software engineering, but above that I love solving problems and learning new technologies while always looking for improvement.

work.summary:
Plan, design and build the backend of the TenTen platform. TenTen provides a solution for customer loyalty and is innovating in the vending machine sector by introducing a SmartBeacon inside vending machines.

In this role I planned and built a distributed architecture over several services that allowed independent development of each system and a clear separation of concerns. My work as one of the first backend engineers was laying out the foundation in which the platform could grow while maintaining speed of feature development and reducing the pains associated with rapid growth.
highlights: Designed and built a distributed service architecture using RabbitMQ
Multiple REST APIs using Rails, Grape, Express
Platform infrastructure & continuous integration, Heroku, AWS, Compose, CircleCI, etc...
Integrated metric collection and reporting using InfluxDB and Grafana over queue based events
Designed the protocol that allows secure communication between the hardware and backend while passing through the phone

work.summary: Phybbit is a multi functional team working on website and mobile applications, interactive experiences and prototype research. My role at Phybbit, as part of the team developing solutions for clients, was to plan, design and build their vision. It involved working in diverse technologies not only on the backend as well as on mobile and web.
highlights: Ruby on Rails and Express REST APIs
Infrastructure planning and management on AWS

work.summary: Design, development and marketing office with a focus on out of the box experiences
highlights: Maintained, monitored and improved infrastructure to support 300+ hosted domains, websites and emails
Configured and maintained Apache, sendmail, qmail, postfix, exchange server, DNS servers, etc...

work.summary: Helped my university to manage and maintain the infrastructure needed by employees, students and faculty members.
highlights: Technical support, backup managment and troubleshooting
